subsubsection.title: SKILLS
subsubsection.p:
Practice each skill in the exercises listed.
Read values from a graph: 14
Find solutions to an equation in two variables: 58
Make a table of values from an equation: 912
Make a table of values from a graph: 1316
Estimate values from a graph: 1720
Use the Trace feature on a calculator: 2124
Find solutions to an equation in two variables from a graph: 2532
